changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reservations ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK ( 64 > LENGTH ( status )), date_from TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, date_to TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, ordered_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, expires_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES users ( id ), service_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES services ( id ) );
